What is Hack Club ?

Philosophy

Hack Club is an initiative for students by students. Hack Club is a place that lets you tinker, break, and rebuild. After all, you can 't make an omelet without breaking a few eggs üç≥

Join a global community !

Community üåè

Hack Club is a global community of hackers and with Hack Club, you get access to a super awesome community that will help you to learn, share, and grow.

Join our slack >

We run our community over slack , join hack club 's slack to chat with the other hack clubbers around the world.

A Global Community!

We are available on the #kenya channel on the hack club slack. Join us there and be part of the community.

Join us on #kenya

Share with the world !

Scrapbook üìô

A daily diary of what Hack Clubbers are learning &making every day on Hack Club 's Scrapbook! We know how good it feels to be able to share your ideas and work with others and that is what Scrapbook is for, go check it out!

Scrapbook!

The Scrapbook is the place where you can share what you are doing and see what your peers are doing!

Take me there >

Organize and attend hackathons!

Hackathons

Hack club members are running the largest hackathons across the world. We will give you full support right from day one which includes mentorship, stickers, and assistance for successfully running your hackathon.

Hack clubs regularly organizes hackathons,workshops and lot of events.

Attend valuable hackathons!

Hack club 's philosophyis learining by doing. Attend nearby hack club events and bring out the innovator inside you!
